maps.mn: Alternate History Battle of Hawaii By Yang Tongguang

de.en: In July 1449, Esen Taishi launched a large-scale, three-pronged invasion of the Ming with his puppet khagan Toqtaq-Buqa.
de.zh: 1449年7月，也先太师挟持傀儡可汗岱總汗对明朝发动了三管齐下的大规模入侵。

maps.mn: Battle of El Alamein by Gu TingWei

de.en: In June 1942, General Montgomery took over as commander of the North African field. Due to the pressure of supply and lack of personnel, Rommel, the desert fox, was ready to attack El Alamein while the Allies had not yet completed their assembly, so as to be able to quickly capture Alexandria and Cairo. In the face of the onslaught of the Desert Fox, Montgomery fought the first Battle of Alamein in October 1942 and successfully defeated the German army. The subsequent Second Battle of Alamein recaptured Tripoli and drove the German army back to the port of Tunisia. The Battle of El Alamein was an important turning point in the North African battlefield. Play Tip: This picture is a pvp picture. It is recommended to play pvp. The city basically does not have the conditions for development, and the technology is basically unreachable. It can only be used as a supply and command center. The goal of both sides is to capture all the command centers of the other side. In addition to regular troops, the army also has logistical units such as engineering teams and reconnaissance aircraft, which can provide vision and build airport fortress roads. Troops can also loot and destroy roads.
de.zh: 1942年6月，北非战场指挥官由蒙哥马利将军接任。迫于补给压力与人员缺乏，沙漠之狐隆美尔准备趁盟军尚未完成集结时进攻阿拉曼，进而能够迅速夺取亚历山大港与开罗。面对沙漠之狐的猛攻，1942年10月蒙哥马利进行了第一次阿拉曼战役，成功击败了德军，后续第二次阿拉曼战役更是夺回了的黎波里并将德军赶回了突尼斯港。阿拉曼战役是北非战场的重要转折点。游玩提示：本图为pvp图，建议pvp游玩，城市基本不具备发展条件，科技基本不能攀，只能作为补给和指挥中心用，双方目标为攻陷另一方所有指挥中心。军队除了常规部队，还有工程队与侦查机等后勤部队，可提供视野与修建机场堡垒道路等。部队也可以掠夺破坏道路。

de.en: The theme of this map is large scale mountains and oceans. There is a large river meandering into the sea in the western part of the map, forming a fertile delta named 'Buyaga River'. It has many tributaries, creating forests, hills, plains, etc. in the vast mountains for people to build cities. In addition to the Buyaga River, there are many rivers in the map that flow between the mountains, some flowing into the sea, and some flowing into inland lakes in the basin. There is a large saltwater lake in the northeast corner of the map, surrounded by plains, hills, and forests, and beyond that, there are mountains that cannot be seen. People here are also accustomed to living in isolation in the basin and are not as keen on war as the countries along the Buyaga River. There is a lot more to be said in the mountains, but now I want to talk about the sea. The coast here is not straight, there is a large opening made by the Buyaga River in the west, and there is a large peninsula almost entirely composed of mountains in the east. People living in the coastal areas are lucky, because they are close to the south and the sea, they can enjoy the warmer sunshine, the warm and humid water vapor from the sea, and the food presented by the sea. There are many small islands in the sea, most of which are small and rugged, and difficult to live in. However, there is a large island in the southwest, with mountains, hills, and large fertile grasslands. People who live here do not know. What is hunger, do not know what is sadness, they created their own powerful marine civilization.
de.zh: 这张地图的主题是大比例的山群与海洋。有一条大河在西部蜿蜒着流入大海，形成肥沃的三角洲，被命名为“布亚加河”。它拥有着众多的支流，在茫茫一片的山岭中为人们创造了可以建立城市居住的森林、丘陵、平原等。除了布亚加河，地图中还有许多河流淌在山间，有些汇入大海，有些则流入盆地中的内陆湖泊。东北角就有一个很大的咸水湖，周围有着平原和丘陵、森林，再往外就是望不到边的大山。这里的人们也习惯了盆地中与世隔绝的生活，不像布亚加河沿岸的国家那样热衷于战争。山中可以说的还有很多，不过现在我要说一说海。这里的海岸算不上平直，西部有一个布亚加河造成的大口子，东部还有一个几乎完全由山地组成的大型半岛。居住在沿海一带的人们是幸运的，因为靠南、靠海，他们可以享受更加温暖和煦的阳光、暖湿的来自大海的水汽，以及大海馈赠的食物。大海中还有许多小岛，大多很小，且地势崎岖，难以居住，不过西南面有一个大岛，上面有山、有丘陵，更有大块的富饶的草原，在这里居住的人们不知道什么叫饥饿，不知道什么叫忧愁，他们创造了属于自己的强大的海洋文明。

maps.mn: Daming vs Pirates by Mao Suo

de.en:
DFC is a well-thought map with different biomes that all blend perfectly in each other. It utilizes all intended features of augmented game mode and make awesome place for roleplay, exploration and conquest. Each starting point has equal amount of starting resources and potential in the late game.
Features:
 - Middle-sized map, big enough to take some time to explore, but small enough to not make transporting units bearable.
 - Rivers, for more exciting battles and more strategic use of surrounding during battles.
 - Biomes, oil-rich desert, northern archipelago, tropical forest - each with unique feel and game mechanic tied to it. Look for secret biomes too!
 - Late game areas, will make nuclear weapons quite a deal to make, so prepare for a tough battle!
 Spacing, convenient during the entire game. Look for the areas to put your strategic  base, sometimes it can change everything! 
Note:
 Map went through several tests, though, third edition will probable be made as well to further improve on some aspects.
Enjoy!
de.zh:
DFC 是一张经过深思熟虑的地图，具有不同的生物群落，它们彼此完美融合。它利用了增强游戏模式的所有预期功能，为角色扮演、探索和征服创造了绝佳的场所。每个起点在游戏后期都有相同数量的起始资源和潜力。
特点：
 - 中等大小的地图，大到需要一些时间去探索，但小到不让移动部队难以忍受。
 - 河流，在战斗中进行更激动人心的战斗和对周围环境的更具战略性的使用。
 - 生物群落、富含石油的沙漠、北部群岛、热带森林 - 每一个都有独特的感觉和与之相关的游戏机制。寻找秘密的生物群落！
 - 游戏后期区域，将让核武器成为一个非常重要的交易，所以准备好一场艰苦的战斗！
 间距，在整个游戏过程中都很方便。寻找放置战略基地的区域，有时它可以改变一切！ 
注意：
 地图经过了多次测试，不过，第三版也可能会在某些方面进一步改进。
享受吧！

de.en: In 1919, after the end of the World War I, the Far East was still surging, with warlords fighting within China, Japan eyeing the Siberian tiger, the British Empire plotted Tibet, and after the success of the Soviet-Russian Revolution, it continued to advance to Siberia, where the remnants of the Russian and White Army existed. Wait for the Western countries to continue their encirclement and suppression of Soviet Russia.
de.zh: 1919年，第一次世界大战结束后，远东却仍然暗流涌动，中国内部军阀混战，日本对东北虎视眈眈，大英帝国图谋西藏，苏俄革命成功后继续向存在俄白军残余的西伯利亚挺进，大英等西方国家继续保持对苏俄的围剿。

de.en: In the year 572 of the Vesima calendar, with the invasion of the Eastern Conquest of Tai Abe, the peace of the Eastern Continent was completely broken. The war swept the entire east. Country comparisons: America-Iran-French Empire, Italy-Stuka Kingdom, Rhine-Freedom of Self-Government, Vior Empire-Franco, Chechnya-Cimero Empire, Mongol-Taiab Empire, France-Splan , Cossack-Dragon Cloud Kingdom, Roman-Marsha Empire, Papal State-Grimaya Kingdom
de.zh: 维西玛历572年，随着泰阿贝东征军的入侵，东部大陆的和平被彻底打破。战争席卷整个东部。国家对照：美利坚-艾兰法兰帝国，意大利-斯图卡王国，莱茵-自由自治同盟，维奥尔帝国-法兰克，车臣-西米罗帝国，蒙古-泰阿贝帝国，法兰西-斯普兰王国，哥萨克-龙云王国，罗马-玛夏帝国，教皇国-格里玛亚王国

de.en: In 2050 a machine was made that would cool the world and stop global warming. Unfortunately it worked a bit too well and the entire world froze. In 2150 the world begins unfreezing but the people lost a lot of modern tech.
de.zh: 2050 年，制造了一台可以为世界降温并阻止全球变暖的机器。 不幸的是，它工作得有点太好了，整个世界都冻结了。 2150 年，世界开始解冻，但人们失去了许多现代科技。

maps.mn: Hypothetical Operation Downfall 1945 by Gu TingWei

de.en: Parallel Worlds, August 1945, World War II is far from over. After the US dropped two atomic bombs as a deterrent, Japan still refused to surrender. The already crazy Japanese military decided to implement the final plan '100 million pieces of jade'. In order to completely end the war, the Allies also decided to launch 'Operation Downfall', and at the same time launched large-scale landings and attacks on Korea and the Japanese mainland under Japanese control. Tip: Start by sharing your vision with other allies.
de.zh: 平行世界，1945年8月，第二次世界大战远远未结束。在美国投下两颗原子弹作为威慑后，日本仍然拒绝投降。已经疯狂的日本军部决定执行最终计划“一亿玉碎”，同盟国为了彻底结束战争也决定发动“没落行动”，同时对日本控制下的朝鲜和日本本土发动大规模登陆和进攻。提示：开局请和其他盟国分享视野。

de.en: A premeditated storm swept the people who strayed into the waters to various small artificial floating islands. In order to survive, the people on the floating islands had to kill each other...
de.zh: 一场有预谋的大风暴将误入此海域的人们冲散到各个小小的人造浮岛上，为了活着，各个浮岛上的人们不得不互相厮杀...

de.en: At 6:00 on February 19, 1945, the U.S. landing force arrived in the waters northwest of Iwo Jima... The Japanese army had already built strong fortifications on Iwo Jima, waiting for the arrival of the U.S. military.
de.zh: 1945年2月19日6:00，美军登陆部队到达硫磺岛西北海域...日军早已在硫磺岛构筑严密的防御工事等待着美军到来。

maps.mn: Knights on the Sea by Li FengTong

de.en: In 1943, with the continuous defeat of the Japanese army in the Pacific battlefield, the base camp decided to concentrate most of the fleet and fight the US military to the death. In response to this decisive battle, the U.S. military also assembled a large number of fleets, but due to lack of time, these fleets were scattered in various sea areas. If the fleet is not concentrated as soon as possible, I am afraid that it will be defeated by the Japanese army one by one. We are the last hope in the Pacific theater. Only those who are not afraid of death deserve to live!
de.zh: 1943年，随着日军在太平洋战场的不断溃败，大本营决定集中大部分舰队与美军决一死战。美军为了应对这场决战，也集结了大量舰队，但因时间不足，这些舰队分散在各个海域。若不趁早集中舰队，恐怕会被日军逐个击破。我们是太平洋战场上最后的希望。只有不怕死的人才配活着！

de.en: In June 1950, the Korean War broke out. China and the United States experienced five large-scale battles, which lasted for three years, and finally signed the Korean Armistice Agreement near the 38th parallel.
de.zh: 1950年6月，朝鲜战争爆发，中美经历了5次大规模战役，历时三年，最终在三八线附近签订了朝鲜停战协定。

de.en: World War II Pacific Theater, April 1942. The end of the Battle of the Coral Sea did not mean an overwhelming victory for the United States in the Pacific. The battered Japanese Combined Fleet decided to concentrate on capturing the strategic points of the United States in the Pacific and eliminating the United States The main naval force in the Pacific. So on May 5 of the same year, Japan assembled 200 almost all of its fleets to launch a Pacific offensive, while the United States only assembled 76 warships for the first time. Because of intelligence, decision-making and other reasons, the United States succeeded in winning more with less. In this war, the United States finally defeated the combined fleet at a small cost. So far, Japan has completely lost the initiative in the Pacific. (Note: In view of the IQ of AI and the vast map, it is recommended to play pvp)
de.zh: 第二次世界大战太平洋战场，1942年4月，珊瑚海海战的结束并不意味着美国在太平洋压倒性的胜利，遭受重创的日本联合舰队决定集中全力攻占美国在太平洋的战略要地并消灭美国在太平洋的海军主力。于是在同年5月5日，日本集结了200艘几乎所有舰队展开太平洋攻势，而美国第一时间仅仅集结了76艘战舰来应对。因为情报、决策等原因美国成功以少胜多，这场战争美国最终以很小代价击败了联合舰队。至此，日本彻底丧失了在太平洋的主动权。（注意：鉴于AI的智商，以及广袤的地图，建议pvp游玩）

maps.mn: Modern Duel for Gold by Stefand

de.en: !PvP map!  Play this scenario with a friend (or yourself XD) as attacker (Acadians) and defender (Abyssynians) and see who is better!  Map features:  Many different possible strategies.  50x50 battlefield for quick (30-turn) games.  150 units on each side.  Glacier/tundra/foresty terrain with a mountain range and a big river.  Railroad, frequent airstrips and forts.  Diverse and balanced units.  No city production.  Some few spies and AWACS.  Cargo convoys for disbanding and building support forces.  If you want to spice things up, you can set your own game rules, for instance: attacker must win in 25 turns, attacker must capture/destroy 3 cities, attacker must win with at least 50 units left and so on.  Have fun!
de.zh: !PvP 地图！ 与朋友（或您自己 XD）作为攻击者（阿卡迪亚人）和防御者（阿比西尼亚人）一起玩这个场景，看看谁更好！ 地图特点：许多不同的可能策略。 50x50 战场，适合快速（30 回合）游戏。 每边150个单位。 冰川/苔原/森林地形，有山脉和一条大河。 铁路，频繁的简易机场和堡垒。 多样化和平衡的单位。 没有城市生产。 一些间谍和预警机。 用于解散和建立支援部队的货运车队。 如果你想增加趣味，你可以设置自己的游戏规则，例如：进攻方必须在 25 回合内获胜，进攻方必须占领/摧毁 3 个城市，进攻方必须在至少还剩 50 个单位的情况下获胜，等等。 玩得开心！

de.en: The moon has been an object that humans have wanted to conquer since ancient times. A mysterious oriental will has transformed the moon to have the conditions of the earth. The ocean is filled with the moon, and the deepest depth is 3000m, which is based on the lowest altitude on the lunar surface. The craters on the moon are proof that countless meteorites have been blocked for the earth, and now they also breed oceans, forming a unique geographical environment. But a large number of craters also hindered access to water, and meteorites also shattered the terrain, leaving plains scarce. Forests also took over water sources one step ahead of humans. But the resources are still very rich. At the same time, MC players told us: If you want to get rich, you must first hit the tree.
de.zh: 月球自古以来一直是人类想征服的对象。某神秘东方意志改造了月球使之拥有了地球的条件，海洋填充了月球，最深深度为3000m，是以月球表面最低海拔处为基准。月球上的环形山是为地球挡下无数陨石的证明，现在也孕育了海洋，形成了独特的地理环境。但是大量的环形山也阻碍了取水，陨石也使得地形破碎，平原稀少。森林也比人类先一步占领了水源。但是资源还是十分丰富的，同时MC玩家告诉我们：想致富先撸树(￣▽￣)。

de.en: The lost continent of Mu in the Pacific Ocean. Where does the terrain come from? (￣▽￣) It is enough to move the topography of the Pacific Ocean and the existing islands into mountains.
de.zh: 太平洋上失落的姆大陆。地形哪里来？(￣▽￣)搬太平洋海底地形并且现有岛屿成山就可以。

maps.mn: Planet Orion GX1467 by Gu TingWei

de.en: When your or other country's launch plans are destroyed by you, have you ever wondered where the spaceships that have been launched go? They start a new cycle on a new planet. The north and south poles are no longer barriers. You think that the continent is one big and two small, but this young planet has only one continent from beginning to end.
de.zh: 当你或者其他国家的发射计划被你摧毁时，你有想过已经发射的飞船去了哪里吗？他们在新的星球开启了新的轮回。南北极不再是屏障，你以为大陆是一大两小两块大陆，但从始至终这颗年轻的星球只有一块大陆。

de.en: Dionysus, a planet full of magnificent colors in the universe. Because the surface of the planet is filled with various noble and toxic gases including helium, carbon dioxide, hydrogen sulfide and so on, it becomes like a gorgeous glass bead. In 2090, when the ascended East used some kind of power to turn her into a life planet, most of the earth forces decided to emigrate after the nuclear war. The revitalized young planet has shattered continents, active volcanoes, and melting north and south poles at the end of the Ice Age. After hundreds of years, what will the humans who arrive here face, will it be another reincarnation? (Tips: This is just a game map used by the Beginner Enhanced Edition to understand the various functional characteristics of the Enhanced Edition, with rich terrain and resources. Beginners must choose United Nations.)
de.zh: 酒神星，一颗宇宙中充满瑰丽色彩的星球。因为星球表面充满了各种包括氦气、二氧化碳、硫化氢等惰性气体和有毒气体而变得犹如一颗绚烂的玻璃珠。2090年，当已飞升的东方使用某种力量使她化为了生命星球后，核战争后大部分地球势力决定移居。生命化后这颗年轻的星球拥有破碎的大陆，活跃的火山，以及冰川时代末期已经融化的南北极。几百年后，到达这里的人类将会面临什么，会是再一次的轮回吗？（Tips：这只是一张新手入门增强版使用的游戏图，用于了解增强版各种机能特性，拥有丰富的地形和资源。新手须选联合国。）

de.en: In 218 BC, the second Punic War broke out between Carthage and Rome, but not only Carthage and Rome, but also a huge alliance formed by tribes lurking nearby. The fuse of the war has been ignited, no one can avoid being affected by this war, and fight back for the homeland! As long as there are foreigners standing in the country, we will never surrender!
de.zh: 公元前218年，迦太基与罗马爆发了第二次布匿战争，但参战方不仅仅有迦太基、罗马，还有潜伏在附近的部落组建的庞大联盟。战争的火索已经被引燃，无人可以避免遭受这场战争的波及，为了家园奋起反击！只要国土内还站着外国人，我们绝不投降！

maps.mn: Quick Multiplayer Match by Patrick Lewsza
Reign of China by Gu TingWei

de.en: This is a relatively simple and cool map suitable for beginners to get started, rich in resources (relative to enemies), and complete terrain. Novices who want to practice their hands, please choose China.
de.zh: 这是适合新手上手摸索的较合理的简单爽图，资源丰富（敌人 相对也是），地形完全。想练手的新手请选中国。

de.en: Since modern times, Northeast China has been the focus of contention between Japan and Russia. In 1904, Japan did not declare war, raided Lushun during the training of the Russian Navy's Far East Squadron stationed in Lushun, and landed in Inchon. The angry Tsarist Russia transferred the elite troops of East Siberia and the Baltic Fleet to the Far East and declared war on Japan. Thus began the Russian War. At the same time, the Qing Empire declared that both were allies and thus remained neutral. The war was ultimately won by Japan, and the Treaty of Portsmouth was signed with Russia under the coordination of the United Kingdom. But in this parallel world, there are historical observers who faithfully observe and record history.
de.zh: 近代以来，中国东北一直是日俄两国争夺的焦点。1904年，日本不宣而战，在驻扎在旅顺的俄罗斯海军远东分舰队训练时突袭旅顺，并登陆仁川，愤怒的沙俄将东西伯利亚的精锐部队和波罗的海舰队调援远东，并向日本宣战，日俄战争就此打响。与此同时，清帝国宣布两者皆为友邦，因此保持中立。战争最终以日本胜利，并在英国的协调下与沙俄签订了《朴茨茅斯条约》。但在这个平行世界，却存在着忠实观察并记录历史的历史观察者。

maps.mn: The Sinking of Atlantis by Yu HangHuan
World War II Asia by Zhang YaWen
World War II Europe by Geroge Ludolph
World War II Europe by Gu TingWei

de.en: In August 1939, the cloud of war loomed over Europe again. German ambitions to annex Austria and Czechoslovakia could no longer be concealed, concentrating two-thirds of its forces on the border with Poland. France announced that if Germany invaded Poland, it would sanction Germany and declare war with the United Kingdom, trying to stop German military action. At the same time, the Soviet Union withdrew from the League of Nations because of the invasion of Finland. The situation appears to be still under the control of the Anglo-French League of Nations. But no one could have predicted what kind of catastrophe the now-seemingly manageable war would turn out to be.
de.zh: 1939年8月，战争的阴云再次笼罩了欧洲。吞并奥地利和捷克斯洛伐克的德国野心再也无法遮掩，将三分之二的兵力集结于波德边境。法国宣布如果德国入侵波兰，将会同英国一起对德制裁并宣战，想要借此喝止德国的军事行动。同时苏联因入侵芬兰，退出了国际联盟。局势貌似还在英法国际联盟的控制中。但是没有人会料到，现在看似可控的战争将会发展成怎样一场浩劫。
